Villa, Sandy Lane, Barbados, $9.95mn

Where On the Sandy Lane estate in St James, on the west coast of the island. Grantley Adams international airport is about half an hour away by car.

What A villa with more than 1,300 sq m of living space including seven bedrooms, two of which are in separate apartments and most of which have walk-in closets. There are also eight bathrooms, a children’s playroom, a gym and home cinema.

Why The property is on more than an acre of landscaped grounds, with a circular driveway on one side of the house and a glass-tiled pool on the other. Its owners also have access to a beachside cabana on the Sandy Lane estate.

Who Knight Frank

House, Melbourne, Australia, A$17mn ($11.1mn)

Where In Hawthorne, an inner suburb of Melbourne. It’s just over half an hour by car or public transport to the Central Business District and about 45 minutes to the international airport in Tullamarine, depending on traffic.

What A late 19th-century house with five bedrooms and three bathrooms, a billiard room, playroom and a cellar with a wine tasting room. Outside there is a swimming pool and tennis court.

Why Originally designed for a local merchant family, the house has been updated but retains period features such as tall sash and stained-glass windows, fireplaces, plasterwork and ornate balcony railings.

Who Private Property Global/Forbes Global Properties

Estate, Mittagong, Australia, A$11mn ($7.18mn)

Where In Mittagong, a town in the Southern Highlands of New South Wales between Sydney (115km, 1 hour 20 minutes’ drive) and Canberra (180km, 2 hours’ drive).

What A 100-acre estate with a four-bedroom main house and a two-bedroom cottage. The house has sheltered verandas and a heated outdoor pool. There’s also a children’s playhouse.

Why The estate includes grazing pastures for cattle, olive groves that produce about 1,500 litres of oil per year, a paddock, orchard and vegetable garden, as well as a machinery shed and other outbuildings.

Who Savills

House, La Barra, Uruguay, $15mn

Where In La Barra, a coastal resort just outside Punta del Este. Montevideo is about 2 hours 20 minutes by car and flights from Punta del Este to Buenos Aires take an hour or less.

What A modern finca-style home on 5ha. It has seven bedrooms, a gym, a spa, large terraces and views of the Maldonado river.

Why The grounds feature landscaping by the Italian garden designer Stefano Baccari, a pool and a separate caretaker’s or guest lodge.

Who Engel & Völkers

Penthouse, Cape Town, South Africa, R28,875,000 ($1.56mn)

Where On the beachfront in Bloubergstrand, a suburb 13km (about 35 minutes’ drive) north of Cape Town. The city’s international airport is a 40-minute drive.

What A duplex penthouse with 380 sq m of living space, including three bedrooms. There’s an open-plan living area on the lower floor, and the upper floor has a dual-aspect roof garden and a Jacuzzi.

Why The property has stunning views of the sea and of Table Mountain, with the city of Cape Town at its base.

Who Savills

别墅，桑迪莱恩，巴巴多斯，995万美元

位置：位于圣詹姆斯(St James)的桑迪莱恩(Sandy Lane)庄园，位于该岛的西海岸。格兰特利•亚当斯国际机场距离此处约半小时车程。

详情：这座别墅拥有超过1300平方米的居住空间，包括七间卧室，其中两间位于独立公寓，大多数卧室都配有步入式衣橱。此外还有八间浴室，一个儿童游戏室，一个健身房和家庭影院。

特别之处：该物业占地超过一英亩，拥有园景地，房子一侧有一个环形车道，另一侧有一个玻璃瓦贴的游泳池。其业主还可以使用桑迪莱恩的海滩小屋。

卖家：莱坊(Knight Frank)

独栋住宅，墨尔本，澳大利亚，1700万澳元

位置：在墨尔本的内郊区霍桑。根据交通情况，乘车或乘坐公共交通工具到中央商务区(Central Business District)大约需要半小时，到图拉马林国际机场大约需要45分钟。

详情：一座拥有五间卧室和三间浴室的19世纪末的房屋，还有一个台球室、游戏室和一个带有品酒室的地下室。室外还有一个游泳池和网球场。

特别之处：这座房子最初是为当地商人家族设计的，经过更新但保留了高大的推拉窗和彩色玻璃窗、壁炉、石膏装饰和华丽的阳台栏杆等时代特色。

卖家：私人财产全球(Private Property Global)/福布斯全球房地产(Forbes Global Properties)

庄园，米塔贡，澳大利亚，1100万澳元

位置：位于新南威尔士州(New South Wales)南部高地的一个名叫米塔贡的小镇，距离悉尼（115公里，1小时20分钟车程）和堪培拉（180公里，2小时车程）之间。

详情：一个占地100英亩的庄园，有一栋四卧室的主楼和一栋两卧室的小屋。主楼有遮阳走廊和一个带加热的室外游泳池。还有一个儿童游戏屋。

特别之处：该庄园包括适合牛群放牧的草地、每年产生约1500升油的橄榄园、一个围场、果园和菜园，以及一个机械棚和其他附属建筑。

卖家：第一太平戴维斯

独栋住宅，拉巴拉，乌拉圭，1500万美元

位置：位于拉巴拉(La Barra)，一个位于埃斯特角城外的海滨度假胜地。蒙得维的亚距离这里约2小时20分钟车程，而从埃斯特角城到布宜诺斯艾利斯(Buenos Aires)的航班只需一小时或更短时间。

详情：一座现代风格的农舍，占地5公顷。它有七间卧室，一个健身房，一个水疗中心，宽敞的露台和马尔多纳多河的美景。

特别之处：该地块由意大利园艺设计师斯特凡诺•巴卡里(Stefano Baccari)设计的景观园林，还设有游泳池和独立的看护人员或客人小屋。

卖家：恩格尔与沃尔克斯

顶层公寓，开普敦，南非，R28,875,000（156万美元）

位置：位于开普敦(Cape Town)北部的布卢伯格斯特兰德海滩，距离市中心13公里（大约35分钟车程）。该市的国际机场距离酒店有40分钟车程。

详情：一套带有380平方米生活空间的复式顶层公寓，包括三间卧室。下层有一个开放式起居区，上层有一个双面屋顶花园和一个按摩浴缸。

特别之处：该物业拥有壮丽的海景和桌山(Table Mountain)景观，底下是开普敦市。

卖家：第一太平戴维斯

titleTranslation: 热门房产：五个天气仍然温暖地区的待售住宅
